familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $100,001 - $1,000,000 and $15,001 - $50,000 in Interest income via two separate transactions from FLATBUSH 340 LENDER, LLC (Loan Receivable from 9 Dekalb Owner LLC; Brooklyn, NY) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner served as President and Authorized Signatory of 340 Flatbush Lender, LLC from Dec 1, 2015, to Jan 1, 2017. The business entity holds a loan receivable from 9 Dekalb Owner LLC, Brooklyn, NY.
